opening: ^Many years have passed since the days of yore
^When dragons roamed the clouds and giants walked the mountains.
^My father told me stories of many mighty heroes in that time.
^Prompt: Say, have you heard the tale of the Dungeon King?
opening_a: ^Gyeh, gyeh, gyeh. Then you are in for a treat.
opening_b: ^From some frilly minstrel, no doubt. Such pomp and primness, but they couldn't tell a tale if it crawled out their mouths and into listening ears.
opening_c: ^Well aren't you the erudite little brat? Well, you've never heard it told this way, I can say that much.
opening_2: ^Take a seat, my child, and let this old man spin one last tale...
^Our story begins, you guessed it, in a dungeon. But it was no ordinary dungeon, no.
^You'll see what I mean in time.

wake_in_dungeon: ^So as I was saying, our story begins in a dungeon.
^He looks so lonely and scared. Let's see if he can escape this place, shall we?
